casebody.data:
EUDY
v.
MICHELIN NORTH AMERICA. No. 285P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2007. Taurus E. Becton, Charlotte, for Michelin North America, et al. Bobby L. Bollinger, Charlotte, for Eudy.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 645 S.E.2d 83.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of June 2007 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 20th day of June 2007."
